channel.title: Posts on Shravan Asati
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Shravan Asati

item.title: How Everything Suddenly Goes Berserk in Production
item.description: I often tend to take a look at the websites I’ve deployed - to check whether they are still online or not (I should use cutting edge tools like kubernetes). It also helps with the gloom that appears on my face when I view the website analytics. One such time was the fine summer morning of 13th June 2024. I woke up late and checked my mobile for notifications (there weren’t any).

item.title: Achieving Infinite WPM in MonkeyType using Python
item.description: So I have this one friend who constantly boasts about his sub-200 WPM typing speed. I tried competing with him but couldn’t manage it above 100 WPM. I decided it was not worth the effort since I could beat him with the help of Python! :) We’ll be using the awesome selenium library for this task. Prerequisites Just intermediate-level knowledge of Python and HTML tags. That’s all. I’ll be explaining selenium along the way.
